meanings.definition: The quality of being able to be used or obtained
meanings.sent1: The availability of fresh water is crucial for our survival.
meanings.sent2: The availability of parking spaces in the city is limited.
meanings.sent3: The availability of snacks in the vending machine always brings a smile to my face.
meanings.sent4: Her availability for help is like a beacon in a storm.
meanings.sent5: The availability of Wi-Fi in the cafe made it a popular spot for students to study.

meanings.definition: The state of being ready for use or able to be accessed
meanings.sent1: The availability of the internet is essential for remote work.
meanings.sent2: The availability of the new software update is delayed.
meanings.sent3: His availability for a chat always brightens my day.
meanings.sent4: The availability of information online is like having a library at your fingertips.
meanings.sent5: The availability of public transportation makes commuting easier for many people.
